Message:
Mysterious powers dwell
in the weapons I create.

They’re magical weapons
that never break,
never rust...

Years ago, some people
were afraid of my weapons,

and they often chased me
out of their shops.

Master was the only one
nice enough to take care
of me.

He died from a disease
a long time ago, though.

Now that I’ve taken
over Master’s shop,
at the very least,
I’ve got to protect it.

Not only that,
but if people have
strong weapons,
there’ll be
no more deaths...

Ones that would keep
their owners alive...
like magic.
